features: 🔥[Three-in-one phone holder for car] Our phone holder for car allows you to install it on the ✔dashboard, ✔windshield or ✔vent without leaving any traces. This mobile phone holder provides you with a simple way to securely fix your mobile phone in place, and is ideal for cars.

🔥[Strong Adhesive Suction] The phone holder for car uses a powerful 3-layer viscous gel and a 1-step locking mechanism to provide strong suction on a smooth surface without leaving any residue. They will not fall off even when turning, bumping or driving at high speeds, and using TPU material can withstand temperatures from -4°F to 203°F. To restore the stickiness, simply rinse with warm water and dry. ❗❗Please note, most likely will not work on leather/ vinyl dashboards.

🔥[Easy operation, strong compatibility] One-handed lightly touch, release or lock the phone within a few seconds-super convenient to use while driving. The SUUSON car phone holder mount has adjustable feet, stronger and wider clips, making this phone holder for car suitable for all (4.0"-7.0") mobile phone and mobile.

🔥[360°view angle available] 360° ball joint and extendable telescopic arm (4.43"-7.31") allow you to adjust the phone to any angle. This cell phone holder for car allows you to use your phone in portrait and landscape mode. Avoid obstructing the line of sight during driving to ensure driving.

🔥[Perfect protection, best design] The car phone holder mount is covered with a thick layer of silica gel. The unprecedented design makes the mobile device zero scratches. The internal mechanical structure ensures that the arm holds the phone firmly. No need to worry that your phone will not fall off even on the most bumpy road. 🔺If you have any product problems or installation problems, please feel free to contact us, we promise to always provide satisfactory solutions and serve you.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The perfect partner for your journey, your best choice SUUSON phone holder for car support you to install it on the dashboard, windshield or vent. You can choose the installation method that suits you according to the different designs and needs of your model. Our cell phone automobile cradles are easy to install in a matter of one minute, easy and fast installation saves time and effort.The phone holder for car uses a powerful 3-layer viscous gel and a 1-step locking mechanism to provide strong suction on a smooth surface without leaving any residue. You no longer have to worry about the bracket moving randomly while driving.The car phone mount adopts the latest long hook locking design which holds your phone securely to the vent. Stable support shelf, firm & scratch-free claw offer secure grip for your cellphone to ensure safer driving, to hold your phone firmly even on the bumpiest road or sharper turn.360° ball joint and extendable telescopic arm (4.43"-7.31") allows your phone can be rotated easily to landscape and poraits as well as anywhere in between, unobstructed view design great for navigation, changing playlists, taking calls and more.The holder panel has been upgraded many times, making it more resistant to abrasion and corrosion, equipped with a thick silicone panel and adjustable bottom tray provides all-around protection to keep your phone from scratches and drops. TRU Material with better heat resistance, which is endurable for the extreme temperature of -4°F-230°F.

All the material we apply is selected after 10,000+ tests, and ensuring its passing rate reach 99.99%, that is why our customers is always loyal to our brand. SUUSON Air Vent Car Phone Mount, Bring Drivers Awesome Experience! The adjustable feet, stronger and wider clips, making this phone holder for car suitable for all (4.0"-7.0") mobile phone and mobile. The car phone holder mount is covered with a thick layer of silica gel. The unprecedented design makes the mobile device zero scratches. The fine part structure ensures excellent performance of the bracket, allowing the driver to drive without distraction. The unique structure designed by us that accords mechanics and ergonomics. It can bring your cell phone more security & convenient to operate.

One Size Fit All: Suitable for all (4.0"-7.0") mobile phone and mobile. Compatible Devices: Compatible with iPhone 14/ 14 Pro/ 14 Pro Max/ 14 Plus/ iPhone 13/ 13 Mini / 13 Pro/ 13 Pro Max/ iPhone 12/ 12 Mini/ 12 Pro/ 12 Pro Max/ 11/ 11 Pro/ 11 Pro Max/ XS/ XS Max/ XR/ X/ 8 Plus/ 8/ 7 Plus/ 7/ 6s/ SE etc, Compatible Samsung Galaxy S22 / S22 Ultra S21 Ultra 5G/ S20/ S20+/ Note10/ Note10+/ S10/ S10+/ S10e/ S9/ S8 etc, Compatible LG G8 G7 ThinQ/ G6+/ V50 V40 ThinQ/ V30/ Stylo 4/ Optimus, Compatible Google Pixel 4/ 4XL/ 3/ 3XL/ 2/ 2XL/ XL, Nexus 6P/ 6/ 7/ 5X, Compatible One plus Moto G7/ Z3, Nokia 7.1/ 6.1, etc. Compatible Thick Case: The depth of the holder is 1.18inch. Suitable for Most case and Battery case etc. Not suitable for thick (>1.18inch) wallet case, folio case.
Note: This phone mount only can hook on horizontal air vent but it cannot be used on the vertical or round air vent. Please carefully check your air vent type of your car before placing an order.

360-Degree Swivel Head Feel free to rotate to any angle you want, easy to set a horizontal, vertical or more layout without obstructing your line of sight. Longer Telescopic Arms Feel free to rotate to any angle you want, easy to set a horizontal, vertical or more layout without obstructing your line of sight. Washable viscous gel Powerful 3-layer viscous gel ensured the strong tack of the holder.To restore the stickiness, simply rinse with warm water and dry. Quick Release & One Hand Operation The car mount is designed with a magic button for releasing your phone in 1s, it can be operated with one hand even when driving.

Due to the different materials of the instrument panels on various vehicle models, it is strongly recommended to install 3M gaskets to avoid poor experience during use: Select the position that needs to be fixed, dry the dust on the instrument panel/windshield, and put the 3M gasket on it for more than 2 hours (The 3M gasket should be left for at least 2 hours, make the gasket is fully bond with the surface of the instrument panel/windshield, so as not to fall off easily).Put the base of the mobile phone stand on the 3M spacer after 2 hours, make the base fully combine with the 3M spacer, and shake it to let the air out, and finally press the button of the base of the mobile phone support. Note : The 3M Gasket just can be used once, please think twice to stick it.The holder and 3M Gasket work best on flat dashboards or glass surfaces and cannot be used on rugged surfaces.If the base does not stick to your car, you can use the 3M Gasket that we give away to solve the concerns.

Warm tips for you SUUSON ensures you with an 24-months pleasant experience. Please read the product images and descriptions carefully before purchasing to ensure that the bracket is suitable for your car model. SUUSON is good at designing car mount accessories, and we are committed to using our rich experience to provide customers with better quality products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great on your desk too!
reviews.reviewText: Originally, I was going to put this in my "Big Girl" Jeep. After assembling it for the suction cup mode, I thought I'd try out the suction power on my mahogany desk with a satin finish. It sticks great! I'll probably just take it off the desk and put it in the Jeep when I'm driving someplace, which really isn't that often.It well-made and fully adjustable. There is an expandable arm that allows you to pull the phone out to about 8", or you can leave it back to about 4". The included a 3M adhesive plate if you want to use the suction cup on a rough surface. It's a 2-thumbs up from me!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best one yet.
reviews.reviewText: As a retired trucker, I've had many. This one here Is worth the review. Best function and really easy to use. I especially liked how it comes with the pad you can place on any surface and them mount the phone holder to that pad. The vibration is very minimal but the value and design makes this a 5 star product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good at what it does
reviews.reviewText: Comparing this to other similarly priced phone holders, I'm pretty satisfied. I bought one for myself, and I had no issues installing it to my car. Works great. However, sometimes I would return to my car after leaving it out it the summer sunlight and find that arm detached from the base, so I would have to re-suction it back on. Maybe it had to do with the heat? I'm not entirely sure, but ever since I started to put windshield sun shades up, it never randomly detached again.It's very adjustable and easy to manage. I actually bought another one for my dad. For his car, the base mount for the holder wouldn't attach to the dashboard to that car as well as mine. It kept slipping, so we eventually mounted the arm to the windshield instead of the dashboard, without the separate base plate. It hasn't been long since the installation, but so far it's working well. I have no clue if the heat will affect this type of installation because it is now fall, but if either products start failing on me or my dad, I will update this review.Overall, I like how it does have many ways to mount in case one way doesn't work for you. The mechanism for the phone grip is kinda cool. And it's better built than the cheap AC vent car phone holder I had before it (that thing lasted 2 weeks tops before it started to have cracks in the plastic causing it to slip off when you drive). Definitely worth it in the $8-$13 price range.Edit: The second one I bought, I attached it to the windshield. The adhesive lasted fine until summer rolled around. After letting it sit in the car in 100+ degree weather, the adhesive eventually gave up leaving me with no other choice than to use the car ac vent mount that came with it. I have another one but it's attached to the car's dashboard and is still fine, especially because I make sure to put up a windshield sunshade whenever I'm not using the car. So if you are planning to attach it to your windshield and you live in a hot climate, I would recommend looking for an alternative.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and has good glue
reviews.reviewText: Very sturdy and easy to set up. The glue stuck to my dashboard very well. Definitely has the bumpy road protection I was looking for in a stand, plus the size adjustability is perfect for whoever's phone is running maps or music on the road

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cell phone holder
reviews.reviewText: This holder works great and easy to put together. You can either hook it to your air vents or glass. I hooked mine to my air vent with no problems. I have in the past had trouble with some not being able to hold my phone so far so good! I bought one for my husband as well and he loves it. The price is great too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well! Adjustable and comes w/ extra adhesive
reviews.reviewText: I've had this product for months in my car. It works great. It fell off at one point and I lost the extra adhesive and ordered more to fix it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great holder, terrible suction.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this holder. It’s much smaller than my other one and doesn’t block my dash. However, the 3M spacer would NOT adhere to my dash. I cleaned the dash and wiped it down with alcohol wipes before trying to apply it, but it would not stick, not even a little. So I have no choice but to use the vent holder (can’t stick things to windshield because of personal reasons).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to put this on my dashboard, but unfortunately the 3M Gasket they call it doesn't seem to like the textured surface. I let it cure for a day, but unfortunately the gasket wouldn't stay attached, effectively ruining the 1 time use adhesive. The suction cup alone works great though. I've tried it on the same dash and moved to onto my windshield to avoid my phone heating up as badly when the vents were running. I swapped away from the vent clip on because its winter, heat would cause my phone to over-heat and it refused to charge. Suction cup is super strong. Go off roading with terrible suspension and its holding still like a champ. The mount has room to run wires through it too, which is nice for keeping things organized looking and avoiding obstructing your view. The telescoping arm and adjustable and rotateable design is neat too, I can lay back and watch a movie or two on it while relaxing. Definitely a keeper!
